text.0: come indra and delight thee with the juice at all the soma feasts.
text.2: to indra pour ye forth the juice the active gladdening juice to him.
text.4: o lord of all men fair of cheek rejoice thee in the gladdening lauds.
text.6: songs have outpoured themselves to thee indra the strong the guardian lord.
text.8: send to us bounty manifold o indra worthy of our wish.
text.9: for power supreme is only thine.
text.10: o indra stimulate thereto us emulously fain for wealth.
text.11: and glorious o most splendid one.
text.12: give indra wide and lofty fame wealthy in cattle and in strength.
text.14: grant us high fame o indra grant riches bestowing thousands those.
text.15: fair fruits of earth borne home in wains.
text.16: praising with songs the praiseworthy who cometh to our aid we call.
text.18: to lofty indra dweller by each libation the pious man.
text.19: sings forth aloud a strengthening hymn.
